          <title>
            <string language="es">Mapa político de Grecia-1</string>
            <string language="en">Political map of Greece 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Politische Karte von Griechenland 1</string>

          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Imagen descargable con un mapa político de Grecia que incluye nombres de regiones y ciudades más importantes.</string>
            <string language="en">A downloadable image of a political map of Greece which includes the names of the main regions and cities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Grecia</string>
            <string language="en">Greece</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">mapa político</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein downloadablebild einer politischen Karte von 
Griechenland, das die Namen der Hauptregionen und der Städte 
einschließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une image downloadable d'une carte politique de 
la Grèce qui inclut les noms des régions et des villes principales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma imagem downloadable de um mapa político de 
Greece que inclui os nomes das regiões e das cidades principais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'immagine downloadable di un programma politico
della Grecia che include i nomi delle regioni e delle città 
principali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια τηλεκατεγραφόμενη εικόνα ενός πολιτικού χάρτη της
Ελλάδας που περιλαμβάνει τα ονόματα των βασικών περιοχών και των 
πόλεων.</string>
          </description>
